mapper.select: select * from v_trmtraindemandsum t1 where trmtraindemandsumid=#{id}
select * from v_trmtraindemandsum t1 where trmtraindemandsumid=#{id}
mapper.sql: SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`HZRQ`, t11.`KCBM`, t1.`ORMORGID`, t31.`ORGNAME` AS `ORMORGNAME`, t1.`TRMTRAINCOURSEID`, t11.`TRMTRAINCOURSENAME`, t1.`TRMTRAINDEMANDID`, t21.`TRMTRAINDEMANDNAME`, t1.`TRMTRAINDEMANDSUMID`, t1.`TRMTRAINDEMANDSUMNAME`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`XQRS` FROM `T_TRMTRAINDEMANDSUM` t1 LEFT JOIN T_TRMTRAINCOURSE t11 ON t1.TRMTRAINCOURSEID = t11.TRMTRAINCOURSEID LEFT JOIN T_TRMTRAINDEMAND t21 ON t1.TRMTRAINDEMANDID = t21.TRMTRAINDEMANDID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t31 ON t1.ORMORGID = t31.ORGID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ENABLE, t1.HZRQ, t11.KCBM, t1.ORMORGID, t31.ORGNAME AS ORMORGNAME, t1.TRMTRAINCOURSEID, t11.TRMTRAINCOURSENAME, t1.TRMTRAINDEMANDID, t21.TRMTRAINDEMANDNAME, t1.TRMTRAINDEMANDSUMID, t1.TRMTRAINDEMANDSUMNAME, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.XQRS FROM T_TRMTRAINDEMANDSUM t1 LEFT JOIN T_TRMTRAINCOURSE t11 ON t1.TRMTRAINCOURSEID = t11.TRMTRAINCOURSEID LEFT JOIN T_TRMTRAINDEMAND t21 ON t1.TRMTRAINDEMANDID = t21.TRMTRAINDEMANDID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t31 ON t1.ORMORGID = t31.ORGID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1
